welcome.title: Welcome to the Kiosk! üëã
welcome.description: We will guide you step by step to reserve your food baskets.

scan.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Scan your card
scan.description: Click on "Scan my card" then present your beneficiary card to the camera. Scanning is automatic!

choose.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Choose your baskets
choose.description: Browse available baskets. You can reserve a maximum of 2 per day.

pin.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Note your PIN code
pin.description: After reservation, a PIN code displays LARGE. Note it well or print it! You will need it to retrieve your baskets.

pickup.title: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Pick up your baskets
pickup.description: Go to the merchant with your PIN code. The address is indicated by clicking on the merchant's name.

enjoy.title: Enjoy your offered baskets üéÅ
enjoy.description: Benefit from baskets offered by solidarity merchants and reduce waste!
